special_attacks: disorienting pounce, mythic power (4/day, surge +1d8), pounce, rend (2 claws, 1d8+12)
feats: Great Fortitude, Improved InitiativeM, Iron WillM, Skill Focus (Perception), Weapon Focus (claws)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +16
description: This owlbear seems lean and especially mean, and moves with a spookily silent grace.

sections.body: Though created long ago, the very first owlbear still lives. Fecund, nomadic and cantankerous, the First Owlbear's offspring are always owlbears, whether the mother is a bear, a giant owl, or an owlbear. He brings his "harem" of mates with him when he hunts, driving them off when he tires of their company or food becomes scarce.

name: Owlbear, The First, Mythic
